snippet.title: VR interactive movie "A.D.2047" is out today at Steam
snippet.description:
STEAM LINK: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1523370/AD_2047/

Four years ago, when the Cyberpunk style was far less prevalent, a VR interactive movie called "A.D. 2047" attracted many players' attention. When most VR-related products were still making a fuss about augmenting virtual reality effects, "A.D. 2047" already focused on the interactive experience of content, trying to polish in-game image quality, plots, actions, and even music, digging deeper into the game's interactivity, and strengthening the players' immersive experience.
On July 8th，the long-awaited high-quality VR interactive movie "A.D. 2047" will finally be launched officially by" Leenzee Games" on Steam, with a limited-time discount price of $13.90.
